newsitem.title: GABON: Gabon polling booths smashed amid election chaos.
newsitem.headline: Gabon polling booths smashed amid election chaos.

text.p: Frustrated voters smashed polling booths in central Gabon and held an official in the country's oil centre on Sunday as local elections degenerated into chaos, electoral commission officials said.

"The election is completely chaotic. They started smashing the booths at Fougamou," National Election Committee vice-president Mengome Atome told Reuters. He said a polling official had been held hostage in his office in Port Gentil, the hub of Gabon's oil industry.
